text: Jürgen Holtz (10 August 1932 – 21 June 2020) was a German actor. He appeared in more than seventy movies, beginning in 1957. Holtz was born in Berlin. He was known for his roles as Karl in Rosa Luxemburg (1986), Egon in Made in Israel (2001) and as Herr in Good Bye, Lenin! (2003). Holtz died on 21 June 2020 in Berlin from cancer-related problems, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Jürgen Holtz
